info.title: Enhanced PRH API
info.description: Test our API services using I/O Docs. Book data from Penguin Random House

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

get.summary: return a list of authors in a domain

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: restrict by web domain

parameters.name: zoom
parameters.description: one or more link rels to be embedded in the response

parameters.name: suppressLinks
parameters.description: don't populate the "_links" elements

parameters.name: suppressRecordCount
parameters.description: don't populate the top-level "recordCount" element; this can be a big time savings for certain queries that are listing unusual populations

parameters.name: preferLanguage
parameters.description: you may specify a single language code (e.g. 'E', 'SP') to have the first sort criteria be a boolean match against a TITLE or WORK record's language; this supersedes and is independent of the specified sort

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: (default=0) the index of the first row to be returned. Zero-based so 'start=10' indicates to start with the eleventh record.

parameters.name: rows
parameters.description: (default=10) the number of rows to be returned. Set to zero to return all available rows.

parameters.name: workId
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more work IDs (see /works)

parameters.name: isbn
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more ISBNs (see /titles)

parameters.name: authorId
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more author IDs (see /authors)

parameters.name: divisionCode
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more division codes (see /divisions)

parameters.name: imprintCode
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more imprint codes (see /imprints)

parameters.name: seriesCode
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more series codes (see /series)

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more format codes (see /formats)

parameters.name: formatFamily
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more format family labels (one of Paperback, Hardcover, Ebook, Board Book, Boxed Set, Audio, App, or Merchandise)

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more event IDs (see /events)

parameters.name: catId
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more category IDs (see /categories)

parameters.name: catUri
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more category alternate identifiers

parameters.name: catSetId
parameters.description: restrict category listings (either primary or secondary) to one or more category groups

parameters.name: titleWebLinkAttr
parameters.description: results must contain a title weblink entry with one of the specified attrs

parameters.name: authorWebLinkAttr
parameters.description: results must contain an author weblink entry with one of the specified attrs

parameters.name: contribRoleCode
parameters.description: restrict by one or more contributor role codes (e.g. 'A', '4')

parameters.name: consumerImprint
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more consumer imprint values (e.g. 'BlueRiderPress','Penguin Audio')

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more language values (e.g. 'E', 'SP')

parameters.name: catSeq
parameters.description: restrict results based on the sequencing of the categories assigned to title records

parameters.name: productLine
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more title product line values

parameters.name: productType
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more title product type values

parameters.name: ageRange
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more title age range values (e.g. '0005', '0408')

parameters.name: salesRestriction
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more sales restriction codes (e.g. '00', '01')

parameters.name: saleStatus
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more sale status codes (e.g. 'IP','OS')

parameters.name: subFormat
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more subformat codes (e.g. '001','BE')

parameters.name: subSeries
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more subseries values (e.g. 'The Rift')

parameters.name: propertyName
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more propertyname values (e.g. 'Sesame Street')

parameters.name: ignoreIsbn
parameters.description: omit one or more ISBNs or records linked to those titles

parameters.name: ignoreWork
parameters.description: omit one or more work IDs or records linked to those works

parameters.name: ignoreAuthor
parameters.description: omit one or more author IDs or records linked to those authors

parameters.name: ignoreFormatFamily
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more format families

parameters.name: ignoreFormatCode
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more format codes

parameters.name: ignoreCatUri
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more category URIs -- currently only works with /categories, /titles and /works

parameters.name: ignoreSeries
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more series codes

parameters.name: ignoreContribRole
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more contrib role codes

parameters.name: ignoreSubFormat
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more sub format codes

parameters.name: ignoreProductLine
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more product line codes

parameters.name: ignoreProductType
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more product type codes

parameters.name: showAwards
parameters.description: results must have an awards record

parameters.name: showBestsellers
parameters.description: results must have an bestsellers record

parameters.name: showNewReleases
parameters.description: results must have an on-sale date between today and 180 days ago

parameters.name: showComingSoon
parameters.description: results must have an on-sale date between today and 90 days from now

parameters.name: showPublishedBooks
parameters.description: results must have an on-sale date of today or earlier

parameters.name: showCovers
parameters.description: titles must have a cover image

parameters.name: showReadingGuides
parameters.description: results must have reading guide content

parameters.name: showTeachersGuides
parameters.description: results must have teachers guide content

parameters.name: showBoxBundles
parameters.description: restrict results to include or exclude titles that have the 'Boxed Set' format family or are identified by their short title as E-book bundles

parameters.name: showNoTitleBlock
parameters.description: restrict results to only include titles that have a NULL 'titleBlock' element

parameters.name: showMovieTieIn
parameters.description: restrict results based on the presence of the 'flag' value 'MOVIE_TIE_IN' on the Title record

parameters.name: showExportOnly
parameters.description: restrict results based on the presence of the 'flag' value 'EXPORT' on the Title record

parameters.name: hasSeriesNumber
parameters.description: restrict results to titles that have their series number field populated

parameters.name: minInPrint
parameters.description: works must have a LTD in-print across all titles greater than the specified number

parameters.name: minPrintScore
parameters.description: same as 'minInPrint' except that the LTD in-print value is adjusted according to business rules (e.g. MM titles are not counted)

parameters.name: awardMaxSeq
parameters.description: restrict results to award winners where the award sequence is less than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: ageRangeMin
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with an age range greater than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: ageRangeMax
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with an age range less than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: onSaleFrom
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with on-sale dates on or after the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: onSaleTo
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with on-sale dates on or before the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: workOnSaleFrom
parameters.description: restrict results to works with on-sale dates on or after the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: workOnSaleTo
parameters.description: restrict results to works with on-sale dates on or before the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: restrict results by one or more category facets (a concatenation of the CAT_SET_ID dash the CAT_URI e.g. 'CN-/fiction')

parameters.name: onTour
parameters.description: only return authors that have a confirmed event in the next 180 days

parameters.name: eventDateFrom
parameters.description: only return authors that have a confirmed event on or after this date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: eventDateTo
parameters.description: only return authors that have a confirmed event on or before this date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: eventMinPrintScore
parameters.description: only return authors that have a confirmed event with a title that has a print score greater than this number; print score is a weighted total in print for all ISBNs in a work

parameters.name: hideAuthorsWithNoPhoto
parameters.description: only return authors that have a photo on file according to the table AC_IMAGE_VW

parameters.name: authorLastInitial
parameters.description: restrict results by one or more last initial facets

parameters.name: showBio
parameters.description: only return authors that have bio content

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: (default 'id') one of 'id', 'authorLast' or 'random'

parameters.name: dir
parameters.description: (default 'asc') either 'asc' or 'desc'

parameters.description: omit one or more ISBNs or records linked to those titles

parameters.description: omit one or more work IDs or records linked to those works

parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more format families

parameters.name: ignoreCatUri
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more category URIs -- currently only works with /categories, /titles and /works

parameters.name: ignoreSeries
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more series codes

parameters.name: ignoreContribRole
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more contrib role codes

parameters.name: showAwards
parameters.description: results must have an awards record

parameters.name: showBestsellers
parameters.description: results must have an bestsellers record

parameters.name: showNewReleases
parameters.description: results must have an on-sale date between today and 180 days ago

parameters.name: showComingSoon
parameters.description: results must have an on-sale date between today and 90 days from now

parameters.name: showPublishedBooks
parameters.description: results must have an on-sale date of today or earlier

parameters.name: showCovers
parameters.description: titles must have a cover image

parameters.name: showReadingGuides
parameters.description: results must have reading guide content

parameters.name: showTeachersGuides
parameters.description: results must have teachers guide content

parameters.name: showBoxBundles
parameters.description: restrict results to include or exclude titles that have the 'Boxed Set' format family or are identified by their short title as E-book bundles

parameters.name: showNoTitleBlock
parameters.description: restrict results to only include titles that have a NULL 'titleBlock' element

parameters.name: showMovieTieIn
parameters.description: restrict results based on the presence of the 'flag' value 'MOVIE_TIE_IN' on the Title record

parameters.name: showExportOnly
parameters.description: restrict results based on the presence of the 'flag' value 'EXPORT' on the Title record

parameters.name: hasSeriesNumber
parameters.description: restrict results to titles that have their series number field populated

parameters.name: minInPrint
parameters.description: works must have a LTD in-print across all titles greater than the specified number

parameters.name: minPrintScore
parameters.description: same as 'minInPrint' except that the LTD in-print value is adjusted according to business rules (e.g. MM titles are not counted)

parameters.name: awardMaxSeq
parameters.description: restrict results to award winners where the award sequence is less than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: ageRangeMin
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with an age range greater than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: ageRangeMax
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with an age range less than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: onSaleFrom
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with on-sale dates on or after the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: onSaleTo
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with on-sale dates on or before the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: workOnSaleFrom
parameters.description: restrict results to works with on-sale dates on or after the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: workOnSaleTo
parameters.description: restrict results to works with on-sale dates on or before the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: series.countMin
parameters.description: restrict series to just those with a minimum number of works; for numbered series this only considers books that have been given series numbers; only considers ISBNs that have a cover image available

parameters.name: series.countMax
parameters.description: restrict series to just those with a maximum number of works; for numbered series this only considers books that have been given series numbers; only considers ISBNs that have a cover image available

parameters.name: series.numbered
parameters.description: return numbered series (true) or unnumbered series (false)

parameters.name: series.kids
parameters.description: return series that have books with a Children or Young Adult consumer category (true) or don't (false)

parameters.name: series.authorId
parameters.description: restrict series matching on the one or two primary authors that we've associated with the series; differs from 'authorId' which would test all the contributors attached to all the ISBN records that have the series code

parameters.name: series.catUri
parameters.description: restrict series matching on the one or two primary categories that we've associated with the series; differs from 'catUri' which would test all the categories attached to all the ISBNS records that have the series code

parameters.name: series.minPrintScore
parameters.description: restrict series to those where the most recent work's print score is at least a certain threshold

parameters.name: series.ebookOriginal
parameters.description: restrict series to those all the ISBN records with that series code have ORIGINAL_ISBN='ORIGINAL' and FORMAT_CODE='EL'

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: (default 'id') one of 'id', 'name', 'seriesDate', 'random'

parameters.name: dir
parameters.description: (default 'asc') either 'asc' or 'desc'

parameters.name: authorId
parameters.description: restrict by author ID

parameters.name: showNoTitleBlock
parameters.description: restrict results to only include titles that have a NULL 'titleBlock' element

parameters.name: showMovieTieIn
parameters.description: restrict results based on the presence of the 'flag' value 'MOVIE_TIE_IN' on the Title record

parameters.name: showExportOnly

parameters.name: hasSeriesNumber

parameters.name: minInPrint
parameters.description: works must have a LTD in-print across all titles greater than the specified number

parameters.description: same as 'minInPrint' except that the LTD in-print value is adjusted according to business rules (e.g. MM titles are not counted)

parameters.name: awardMaxSeq
parameters.description: restrict results to award winners where the award sequence is less than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: ageRangeMin
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with an age range greater than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: ageRangeMax
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with an age range less than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: onSaleFrom
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with on-sale dates on or after the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: onSaleTo
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with on-sale dates on or before the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: workOnSaleFrom
parameters.description: restrict results to works with on-sale dates on or after the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: workOnSaleTo
parameters.description: restrict results to works with on-sale dates on or before the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: restrict results by one or more category facets (a concatenation of the CAT_SET_ID dash the CAT_URI e.g. 'CN-/fiction')

parameters.name: onTour
parameters.description: only return authors that have a confirmed event in the next 180 days

parameters.name: eventDateFrom
parameters.description: only return authors that have a confirmed event on or after this date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: eventDateTo
parameters.description: only return authors that have a confirmed event on or before this date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: eventMinPrintScore
parameters.description: only return authors that have a confirmed event with a title that has a print score greater than this number; print score is a weighted total in print for all ISBNs in a work

parameters.name: hideAuthorsWithNoPhoto
parameters.description: only return authors that have a photo on file according to the table AC_IMAGE_VW

parameters.name: authorLastInitial
parameters.description: restrict results by one or more last initial facets

parameters.name: showBio
parameters.description: only return authors that have bio content

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: (default 'id') one of 'id', 'authorLast' or 'random'

parameters.name: dir
parameters.description: (default 'asc') either 'asc' or 'desc'

parameters.name: series.countMin
parameters.description: restrict series to just those with a minimum number of works; for numbered series this only considers books that have been given series numbers; only considers ISBNs that have a cover image available

parameters.name: series.countMax
parameters.description: restrict series to just those with a maximum number of works; for numbered series this only considers books that have been given series numbers; only considers ISBNs that have a cover image available

parameters.name: series.numbered
parameters.description: return numbered series (true) or unnumbered series (false)

parameters.name: series.kids
parameters.description: return series that have books with a Children or Young Adult consumer category (true) or don't (false)

parameters.name: series.authorId
parameters.description: restrict series matching on the one or two primary authors that we've associated with the series; differs from 'authorId' which would test all the contributors attached to all the ISBN records that have the series code

parameters.name: series.catUri
parameters.description: restrict series matching on the one or two primary categories that we've associated with the series; differs from 'catUri' which would test all the categories attached to all the ISBNS records that have the series code

parameters.name: series.minPrintScore
parameters.description: restrict series to those where the most recent work's print score is at least a certain threshold

parameters.name: series.ebookOriginal
parameters.description: restrict series to those all the ISBN records with that series code have ORIGINAL_ISBN='ORIGINAL' and FORMAT_CODE='EL'

parameters.name: series.authorId
parameters.description: restrict series matching on the one or two primary authors that we've associated with the series; differs from 'authorId' which would test all the contributors attached to all the ISBN records that have the series code

parameters.name: series.catUri
parameters.description: restrict series matching on the one or two primary categories that we've associated with the series; differs from 'catUri' which would test all the categories attached to all the ISBNS records that have the series code

parameters.name: series.minPrintScore
parameters.description: restrict series to those where the most recent work's print score is at least a certain threshold

parameters.name: series.ebookOriginal
parameters.description: restrict series to those all the ISBN records with that series code have ORIGINAL_ISBN='ORIGINAL' and FORMAT_CODE='EL'

parameters.name: showMovieTieIn

parameters.name: showExportOnly

parameters.name: hasSeriesNumber
parameters.description: restrict results to titles that have their series number field populated

parameters.name: minInPrint
parameters.description: works must have a LTD in-print across all titles greater than the specified number

parameters.description: same as 'minInPrint' except that the LTD in-print value is adjusted according to business rules (e.g. MM titles are not counted)

parameters.name: awardMaxSeq
parameters.description: restrict results to award winners where the award sequence is less than or equal to the specified value

parameters.description: restrict results to titles with an age range greater than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: ageRangeMax
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with an age range less than or equal to the specified value

parameters.description: restrict results to titles with on-sale dates on or after the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: onSaleTo
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with on-sale dates on or before the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: workOnSaleFrom
parameters.description: restrict results to works with on-sale dates on or after the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: workOnSaleTo
parameters.description: restrict results to works with on-sale dates on or before the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: (default 'id') one of 'id', 'onsale', 'title_onsale', 'title', 'authorLast', 'award', 'printScore', 'seriesNumber', random'; the 'title_onsale' is meant to sort on the on-sale date of the joined TITLE table rather than using the on-sale date of the work; for more information on 'printscore', see the Concepts page in the documentation of the same name.

parameters.description: (default 'asc') either 'asc' or 'desc'

parameters.name: showBestsellers
parameters.description: results must have an bestsellers record

parameters.name: showNewReleases
parameters.description: results must have an on-sale date between today and 180 days ago

parameters.name: showComingSoon
parameters.description: results must have an on-sale date between today and 90 days from now

parameters.name: showPublishedBooks
parameters.description: results must have an on-sale date of today or earlier

parameters.name: showCovers
parameters.description: titles must have a cover image

parameters.name: showReadingGuides
parameters.description: results must have reading guide content

parameters.name: showTeachersGuides
parameters.description: results must have teachers guide content

parameters.name: showBoxBundles
parameters.description: restrict results to include or exclude titles that have the 'Boxed Set' format family or are identified by their short title as E-book bundles

parameters.name: showNoTitleBlock
parameters.description: restrict results to only include titles that have a NULL 'titleBlock' element

parameters.name: showMovieTieIn
parameters.description: restrict results based on the presence of the 'flag' value 'MOVIE_TIE_IN' on the Title record

parameters.name: showExportOnly
parameters.description: restrict results based on the presence of the 'flag' value 'EXPORT' on the Title record

parameters.name: hasSeriesNumber
parameters.description: restrict results to titles that have their series number field populated

parameters.name: minInPrint
parameters.description: works must have a LTD in-print across all titles greater than the specified number

parameters.name: minPrintScore
parameters.description: same as 'minInPrint' except that the LTD in-print value is adjusted according to business rules (e.g. MM titles are not counted)

parameters.name: awardMaxSeq
parameters.description: restrict results to award winners where the award sequence is less than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: ageRangeMin
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with an age range greater than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: ageRangeMax
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with an age range less than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: onSaleFrom
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with on-sale dates on or after the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: onSaleTo
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with on-sale dates on or before the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: workOnSaleFrom
parameters.description: restrict results to works with on-sale dates on or after the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: workOnSaleTo
parameters.description: restrict results to works with on-sale dates on or before the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: (default 'id') one of 'id', 'onsale', 'title_onsale', 'title', 'authorLast', 'award', 'printScore', 'seriesNumber', random'; the 'title_onsale' is meant to sort on the on-sale date of the joined TITLE table rather than using the on-sale date of the work; for more information on 'printscore', see the Concepts page in the documentation of the same name.

parameters.name: dir
parameters.description: (default 'asc') either 'asc' or 'desc'

parameters.name: seriesCode
parameters.description: restrict by series code

parameters.name: showAwards
parameters.description: results must have an awards record

parameters.name: showBestsellers
parameters.description: results must have an bestsellers record

parameters.name: showNewReleases
parameters.description: results must have an on-sale date between today and 180 days ago

parameters.name: showComingSoon
parameters.description: results must have an on-sale date between today and 90 days from now

parameters.name: showPublishedBooks
parameters.description: results must have an on-sale date of today or earlier

parameters.name: showCovers
parameters.description: titles must have a cover image

parameters.name: showReadingGuides
parameters.description: results must have reading guide content

parameters.name: showTeachersGuides
parameters.description: results must have teachers guide content

parameters.name: showBoxBundles
parameters.description: restrict results to include or exclude titles that have the 'Boxed Set' format family or are identified by their short title as E-book bundles

parameters.name: showNoTitleBlock
parameters.description: restrict results to only include titles that have a NULL 'titleBlock' element

parameters.name: showMovieTieIn
parameters.description: restrict results based on the presence of the 'flag' value 'MOVIE_TIE_IN' on the Title record

parameters.name: showExportOnly
parameters.description: restrict results based on the presence of the 'flag' value 'EXPORT' on the Title record

parameters.name: hasSeriesNumber
parameters.description: restrict results to titles that have their series number field populated

parameters.name: minInPrint
parameters.description: works must have a LTD in-print across all titles greater than the specified number

parameters.name: minPrintScore
parameters.description: same as 'minInPrint' except that the LTD in-print value is adjusted according to business rules (e.g. MM titles are not counted)

parameters.name: awardMaxSeq
parameters.description: restrict results to award winners where the award sequence is less than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: ageRangeMin
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with an age range greater than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: ageRangeMax
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with an age range less than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: onSaleFrom
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with on-sale dates on or after the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: onSaleTo
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with on-sale dates on or before the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: workOnSaleFrom
parameters.description: restrict results to works with on-sale dates on or after the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: workOnSaleTo
parameters.description: restrict results to works with on-sale dates on or before the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: series.countMin
parameters.description: restrict series to just those with a minimum number of works; for numbered series this only considers books that have been given series numbers; only considers ISBNs that have a cover image available

parameters.name: series.countMax
parameters.description: restrict series to just those with a maximum number of works; for numbered series this only considers books that have been given series numbers; only considers ISBNs that have a cover image available

parameters.name: series.numbered
parameters.description: return numbered series (true) or unnumbered series (false)

parameters.name: series.kids
parameters.description: return series that have books with a Children or Young Adult consumer category (true) or don't (false)

parameters.name: series.authorId
parameters.description: restrict series matching on the one or two primary authors that we've associated with the series; differs from 'authorId' which would test all the contributors attached to all the ISBN records that have the series code

parameters.name: series.catUri
parameters.description: restrict series matching on the one or two primary categories that we've associated with the series; differs from 'catUri' which would test all the categories attached to all the ISBNS records that have the series code

parameters.name: series.minPrintScore
parameters.description: restrict series to those where the most recent work's print score is at least a certain threshold

parameters.name: series.ebookOriginal
parameters.description: restrict series to those all the ISBN records with that series code have ORIGINAL_ISBN='ORIGINAL' and FORMAT_CODE='EL'

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: (default 'id') one of 'id', 'name', 'seriesDate', 'random'

parameters.name: dir
parameters.description: (default 'asc') either 'asc' or 'desc'

parameters.name: workId
parameters.description: restrict by work ID

parameters.description: results must have an bestsellers record

parameters.name: showNewReleases
parameters.description: results must have an on-sale date between today and 180 days ago

parameters.name: showComingSoon
parameters.description: results must have an on-sale date between today and 90 days from now

parameters.name: showPublishedBooks
parameters.description: results must have an on-sale date of today or earlier

parameters.name: showCovers
parameters.description: titles must have a cover image

parameters.name: showReadingGuides
parameters.description: results must have reading guide content

parameters.name: showTeachersGuides
parameters.description: results must have teachers guide content

parameters.name: showBoxBundles
parameters.description: restrict results to include or exclude titles that have the 'Boxed Set' format family or are identified by their short title as E-book bundles

parameters.name: showNoTitleBlock
parameters.description: restrict results to only include titles that have a NULL 'titleBlock' element

parameters.name: showMovieTieIn
parameters.description: restrict results based on the presence of the 'flag' value 'MOVIE_TIE_IN' on the Title record

parameters.name: showExportOnly
parameters.description: restrict results based on the presence of the 'flag' value 'EXPORT' on the Title record

parameters.name: hasSeriesNumber
parameters.description: restrict results to titles that have their series number field populated

parameters.name: minInPrint
parameters.description: works must have a LTD in-print across all titles greater than the specified number

parameters.name: minPrintScore
parameters.description: same as 'minInPrint' except that the LTD in-print value is adjusted according to business rules (e.g. MM titles are not counted)

parameters.name: awardMaxSeq
parameters.description: restrict results to award winners where the award sequence is less than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: ageRangeMin
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with an age range greater than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: ageRangeMax
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with an age range less than or equal to the specified value

parameters.name: onSaleFrom
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with on-sale dates on or after the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: onSaleTo
parameters.description: restrict results to titles with on-sale dates on or before the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: workOnSaleFrom
parameters.description: restrict results to works with on-sale dates on or after the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: workOnSaleTo
parameters.description: restrict results to works with on-sale dates on or before the supplied date (MM/dd/yyyy)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: (default 'id') one of 'id', 'onsale', 'title_onsale', 'title', 'authorLast', 'award', 'printScore', 'seriesNumber', random'; the 'title_onsale' is meant to sort on the on-sale date of the joined TITLE table rather than using the on-sale date of the work; for more information on 'printscore', see the Concepts page in the documentation of the same name.

parameters.name: dir
parameters.description: (default 'asc') either 'asc' or 'desc'

get.summary: return a list of works with additional data elemen...
get.description: return a list of works with additional data elements (must provide a series code)

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: restrict by web domain

parameters.name: zoom
parameters.description: one or more link rels to be embedded in the response

parameters.name: suppressLinks
parameters.description: don't populate the "_links" elements

parameters.name: suppressRecordCount
parameters.description: don't populate the top-level "recordCount" element; this can be a big time savings for certain queries that are listing unusual populations

parameters.name: preferLanguage
parameters.description: you may specify a single language code (e.g. 'E', 'SP') to have the first sort criteria be a boolean match against a TITLE or WORK record's language; this supersedes and is independent of the specified sort

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: (default=0) the index of the first row to be returned. Zero-based so 'start=10' indicates to start with the eleventh record.

parameters.name: rows
parameters.description: (default=10) the number of rows to be returned. Set to zero to return all available rows.

parameters.name: workId
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more work IDs (see /works)

parameters.name: isbn
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more ISBNs (see /titles)

parameters.name: authorId
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more author IDs (see /authors)

parameters.name: divisionCode
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more division codes (see /divisions)

parameters.name: imprintCode
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more imprint codes (see /imprints)

parameters.name: seriesCode
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more series codes (see /series)

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more format codes (see /formats)

parameters.name: formatFamily
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more format family labels (one of Paperback, Hardcover, Ebook, Board Book, Boxed Set, Audio, App, or Merchandise)

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more event IDs (see /events)

parameters.name: catId
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more category IDs (see /categories)

parameters.name: catUri
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more category alternate identifiers

parameters.name: catSetId
parameters.description: restrict category listings (either primary or secondary) to one or more category groups

parameters.name: titleWebLinkAttr
parameters.description: results must contain a title weblink entry with one of the specified attrs

parameters.name: authorWebLinkAttr
parameters.description: results must contain an author weblink entry with one of the specified attrs

parameters.name: contribRoleCode
parameters.description: restrict by one or more contributor role codes (e.g. 'A', '4')

parameters.name: consumerImprint
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more consumer imprint values (e.g. 'BlueRiderPress','Penguin Audio')

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more language values (e.g. 'E', 'SP')

parameters.name: catSeq
parameters.description: restrict results based on the sequencing of the categories assigned to title records

parameters.name: productLine
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more title product line values

parameters.name: productType
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more title product type values

parameters.name: ageRange
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more title age range values (e.g. '0005', '0408')

parameters.name: salesRestriction
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more sales restriction codes (e.g. '00', '01')

parameters.name: saleStatus
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more sale status codes (e.g. 'IP','OS')

parameters.name: subFormat
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more subformat codes (e.g. '001','BE')

parameters.name: subSeries
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more subseries values (e.g. 'The Rift')

parameters.name: propertyName
parameters.description: restrict results based on one or more propertyname values (e.g. 'Sesame Street')

parameters.name: ignoreIsbn
parameters.description: omit one or more ISBNs or records linked to those titles

parameters.name: ignoreWork
parameters.description: omit one or more work IDs or records linked to those works

parameters.name: ignoreAuthor
parameters.description: omit one or more author IDs or records linked to those authors

parameters.name: ignoreFormatFamily
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more format families

parameters.name: ignoreFormatCode
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more format codes

parameters.name: ignoreCatUri
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more category URIs -- currently only works with /categories, /titles and /works

parameters.name: ignoreSeries
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more series codes

parameters.name: ignoreContribRole
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more contrib role codes

parameters.name: ignoreSubFormat
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more sub format codes

parameters.name: ignoreProductLine
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more product line codes

parameters.name: ignoreProductType
parameters.description: omit records linked to one or more product type codes
